0.name: Frost Shot
0.fullDesc: Deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Pela's ATK to a single target enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: Frostbite
0.fullDesc: Removes <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> <u>buff(s)</u> and deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Pela's ATK to a single target enemy.
0.shortDesc: <color=#f29e38ff>Dispels</color> 1 <color=#f29e38ff><u>buff</u></color> from a single enemy target, and deals Ice DMG to the target enemy.

0.name: Zone Suppression
0.fullDesc: Deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color> of Pela's ATK to all enemies, with a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> to inflict Exposed on all enemies.\nWhen Exposed, enemies' DEF is reduced by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
0.shortDesc: Has a high chance of <color=#f29e38ff>lowering enemies' DEF</color> and deals minor Ice DMG to all enemies.

0.name: Preemptive Strike
0.fullDesc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Pela deals Ice DMG equal to <unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak> of her ATK to a random enemy, with a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> of lowering the DEF of all enemies by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
0.shortDesc: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals minor DMG to a random single enemy, with a high chance of lowering the DEF of all enemy targets.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
